mapper.sql: item.id, item.title, item.sell_point as sellPoint, item.price, item.num, item.barcode, item.image, item.cid, item.status, item.created, item.updated, cat.name as catName
mapper.select: select from tb_item item left join tb_item_cat cat on item.cid = cat.id order by item.id desc limit #{offset},#{rows}
